rules.name: disableTNTChainReaction
rules.description: Makes TNT act like normal blocks when blown up

rules.name: fallingBlockThreadSleep
extras: ((if you set this higher than 60 seconds you are a FOOL))

rules.name: optimizedTNTExtra
extras: Stores velocity values, this optimization optimizes many tnt that explode in the same spot. For full effectiveness, also enable optimizedTNT.

rules.name: slimeChunks
rules.description: Makes either all or no chunks behave like Slime Chunks
